title: PBE Acceptance
body: So I was having a bit of slow internet, and decided to open up my PBE application to see how it was doing. It was a bit laggy, but it said I was accepted had the fields to make an account and download the client, but when I came back to the page a few minutes later, it said it was still pending?

replies.body: The PBE page was having issues loading properly or signing up at all, per the current [pinned thread.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Q8vGhigp-442017-pbe-signup-site-issues) I see that your application has been received, but hasn't been approved yet.  Sorry for the confusion!
then it probably was a bug. sorry bout that.
